View Javadoc
1   package com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto;
2   
3   import java.time.LocalDateTime;
4   
5   import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringBuilder;
6   import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
7   import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.media.Schema;
8   
9   import com.mamezou.rms.core.domain.Reservation;
10  
11  import lombok.Getter;
12  import lombok.Setter;
13  
14  @Schema(description = "予約DTO")
15  @Getter
16  @Setter
17  public class ReservationResourceDto {
18  
19      @Schema(required = true)
20      private Integer id;
21  
22      @Schema(required = true)
23      private LocalDateTime startDateTime;
24  
25      @Schema(required = true)
26      private LocalDateTime endDateTime;
27  
28      @Schema(required = false)
29      private String note;
30  
31      @Schema(required = true)
32      private int rentalItemId;
33  
34      @Schema(required = true)
35      private int userAccountId;
36  
37      @Schema(required = true)
38      private UserAccountResourceDto userAccountDto;
39  
40      @Schema(required = true)
41      private RentalItemResourceDto rentalItemDto;
42  
43      public static ReservationResourceDto toDto(Reservation entity) {
44          if (entity == null) {
45              return null;
46          }
47          var dto = new ReservationResourceDto();
48          dto.setId(entity.getId());
49          dto.setStartDateTime(entity.getStartDateTime());
50          dto.setEndDateTime(entity.getEndDateTime());
51          dto.setNote(entity.getNote());
52          dto.setRentalItemId(entity.getRentalItemId());
53          dto.setUserAccountId(entity.getUserAccountId());
54          dto.setRentalItemDto(entity.getRentalItem().transform(RentalItemResourceDto::toDto));
55          dto.setUserAccountDto(entity.getUserAccount().transform(UserAccountResourceDto::toDto));
56          return dto;
57      }
58  
59      @Override
60      public String toString() {
61          return ToStringBuilder.reflectionToString(this, ToStringStyle.SHORT_PREFIX_STYLE);
62      }
63  
64  }
